statements: DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE outage_id = 100 AND outage_date = '2022-01-05';
DELETE FROM service_disruptions WHERE disruption_date <= '2022-03-15' AND cause = 'Power Failure';
DELETE FROM outage_reports WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center' AND installation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE duration > 60 AND affected_service = 'Internet';
DELETE FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date < '2021-01-01' OR reported_by = 'Admin';
